extension.summary: Backup LibreELEC system to local or remote storage with real-time progress
extension.description: Backup and restore your LibreELEC configuration, addons, and user data with real-time progress tracking. Supports local and remote storage (SMB, NFS, FTP, SFTP, WebDAV). Features accurate file size display, optimized performance for small files, configurable compression levels, and email notifications.
